column3: Don't think I haven't noticed you admiring my outfit! I bet you'd like to know where I got my hands on it, wouldn't you? Pay a visit to Ul'dah, ask around, and maybe you'll be lucky enough to find out!
I see ye too find me attire to be quite fetchin'. Where did I get it, ye ask? Well, it'd hardly be fun if I just told ye now, would it? Go on o'er to Ul'dah and find out fer yerself!

I must say, that was quite something...
What's that? Why am I elated so? Why settle for hearing about <Emphasis>my</Emphasis> dreams when you could be living out your own? Head to Emerald Avenue and try asking around!
